caption.p: Effects of catechin (2, 5, 10, 15, 30 and 50 mg/kg) and glibenclamide (5 mg/kg) on pancreas histopathology studies in STZ-induced diabetic rats (H&E staining; 40×, scale bar = 100 μm): ( A) control group; ( B) diabetic control group; ( C) glibenclamide (5 mg/kg/overly) treated group; ( D, E) CTN (2, 5 mg/kg/orally) treated group; ( F, G) CTN (10, 15 mg/kg/orally) treated groups ( H, I) CTN (30 and 50 mg/kg/orally) treated group.
